title: The Exchange: CDP’s water boss
description:
Cate Lamb works with shareholders managing some $90 trln of assets to push companies to address water-scarcity and flood risks. She explains what can be done to mitigate the problem – and how doing too little costs businesses billions and can sink economic growth. See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.
